column1: Drink some warm milk to get some good night's sleep
Love your screen? Try not to be on your phone at least 2 hours before bed to get a goodnight's quality sleep!
Had a stressful day? Get a good amount of exercise done before you hit the sack to get good quality sleep!
When you can't sleep try to not look at a clock! It might make it harder to fall asleep!
Sleep in a dark environment so the production of melatonin is at its peak to help you sleep!
Try listening to calming music before bed to help you sleep better!
Keeping a pocket journal can help you dump your thoughts so you can get a good night's rest!
Use an eye mask to sleep. Sleeping in the dark helps your body get good quality sleep!
